title: Introducing: Theme Park
body:
Artwork by [Kate Graham](http://www.comeintoland.com/2010/03/kate-graham/ "Permanent Link to Kate Graham")

In a world saturated by lo-fi drone and bratty LA hip-hop it’s a rare thing these days to come across music that can be simply described as ‘fun’. That’s not to belittle [**Theme Park**](http://soundcloud.com/themepark), their jerky 80’s inspired debut tunes sport a rather intricate little sonic arrangement. But more than anything their music acts as an antidote; catchy hooks, joyous synths combined with youthful and delirious vocals are the order of the day. It could be just enough to take your attention away from _GOBLIN_ (it leaked by the way).
